title: Floods hit South Africa’s KwaZu­lu-Na­tal province again
excerpt: The floods come only a month af­ter tor­ren­tial rains killed 435 peo­ple in KwaZu­lu-Na­tal.

title: Mozam­bique: Cy­clone Gombe death toll ris­es to 53
excerpt: In re­cent years, South­ern Africa has suf­fered re­peat­ed dev­as­tat­ing cy­clones that used to be rel­a­tive­ly rare.

title: Mozam­bique an­nounces new prime min­is­ter af­ter cab­i­net reshuf­fle
excerpt: New min­is­ters were named af­ter a ma­jor reshuf­fle by Pres­i­dent Fil­ipe Nyusi.

title: Analy­sis: Can African gas re­place Russ­ian sup­plies to Eu­rope?
excerpt: A lack of in­fra­struc­ture, not ca­pac­i­ty, could hurt the con­ti­nent’s plan to sup­ply gas to Eu­rope in Rus­sia’s stead.

title: Dozens dead from Trop­i­cal Storm Ana in south­ern Africa
excerpt: At least 70 killed in storm that struck Mada­gas­car, Mozam­bique and Malawi as au­thor­i­ties scram­ble to re­pair dam­ages.

title: South­ern Africa bloc SADC ex­tends Mozam­bique mis­sion
excerpt: Re­gion­al body says progress made against rebels in Cabo Del­ga­do province since troops de­ployed last year.

title: Start Here
excerpt: Why peo­ple in Mada­gas­car are starv­ing.

title: In Mozam­bique, Kagame says Rwan­dan troops’ work not over
excerpt: Rwan­dan pres­i­dent says his coun­try’s force will help se­cure and re­build Cabo Del­ga­do ar­eas de­stroyed by armed cam­paign.

title: Rwan­da, Mozam­bique forces re­cap­ture port city from rebels
excerpt: Mocim­boa da Pra­ia, home to one of Africa’s biggest nat­ur­al gas projects, re­tak­en from rebels, Rwan­dan army says.

title: Rwan­da de­ploys 1,000 sol­diers to Mozam­bique’s Cabo Del­ga­do
excerpt: Gov’t says de­ploy­ment at re­quest of Mozam­bi­can au­thor­i­ties aimed at restor­ing state con­trol in con­flict-hit province.

title: South­ern African na­tions agree to de­ploy forces to Mozam­bique
excerpt: The SADC Stand­by Force will sup­port Mozam­bique ‘to com­bat ter­ror­ism and acts of vi­o­lent ex­trem­ism’ in Cabo Del­ga­do.

title: Vi­su­al­is­ing 70 years of refugee jour­neys
excerpt: On World Refugee Day, Al Jazeera looks at the painful jour­neys refugees were forced on in 2020 de­spite glob­al pan­dem­ic.

title: Dozens of chil­dren, most­ly girls, ab­duct­ed by Mozam­bique fight­ers
excerpt: Save the Chil­dren says 51 mi­nors tak­en by armed groups in Cabo Del­ga­do in 2020, a fig­ure like­ly an un­der­es­ti­mate.

title: White peo­ple res­cued be­fore Black peo­ple in Pal­ma: Amnesty
excerpt: Rights group al­leges white con­trac­tors air­lift­ed to safe­ty be­fore lo­cal Black peo­ple af­ter raid on Mozam­bi­can town.
